sentences.english: Phenomenon of estuarine turbidity maximum zone is modeled by 2-dimensional numerical model.
sentences.chinese: 利用平面二维数值模型模拟河口最大浑浊带现象。

sentences.english: Conclusion Electromagnetic fields can be used to reduce turbidity value and fluoride in water.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨复合电磁场降低水的浑浊度和除氟功能。

sentences.english: Its muddy water makes the ocean brown for 200 miles.
sentences.chinese: 浑浊的河水使河口200英里范围的海洋变成棕黄色。

sentences.english: And make sure the eyes are clear, not cloudy.
sentences.chinese: 保证鱼眼是清澈的，不浑浊。

sentences.english: The relationship between the turbidity maximum and the river mouth bar is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 据此讨论了最大浑浊带与拦门沙的关系。

sentences.english: Murky brown water grows to roof tops and lapped around the high-rises.
sentences.chinese: 浑浊的棕色河水已经升到屋顶，拍打着高楼大厦。

sentences.english: Since then , befouled water, mildewed fodder and the relentless whip have been a way of life for the horse.
sentences.chinese: 它的生活中只有浑浊的水，霉烂的草料和疯狂的鞭打。

sentences.english: However, after the thunderstorm, the water was turbulent with some whirls in the middle of the river.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在雷雨后，水是浑浊的有些还在河中央旋转。

sentences.english: He refused a raspy dust nets.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝的是一张浑浊的尘网。

sentences.english: Here are no heights of truth overlooking the confused landscape of that dubitable domain.
sentences.chinese: 这里没有事实到达一个高度可以俯瞰浑浊的世间。

sentences.english: Unqualified detected items in secondary water supply primarily were the concentrations of turbidity and iron.
sentences.chinese: 二次供水不合格的检测项目主要为浑浊度和铁。

sentences.english: Rills of muddy water rushed and swelled the stream and sund my boat.
sentences.chinese: 浑浊的流水奔涌翻腾，淹没了我的纸船。

sentences.english: Originally the fresh air, turned into sand mixing up the turbid air.
sentences.chinese: 原本新鲜的空气，却变成了黄沙混合起来的浑浊空气。

sentences.english: With age, the lens may become misshaped and the corneal tissue may become clouded.
sentences.chinese: 衰老过程中，晶体可能逐渐变形，角膜组织逐渐浑浊。

sentences.english: This means that stale air lingers in the bottom of our lungs.
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着浑浊的空气老是存留在肺的底部。

sentences.english: This clouding can be caused by an inflammation under the flap of cornea tissue.
sentences.chinese: 这种浑浊是由角膜瓣下角膜组织的炎症反应所造成的。

definition: to turn pale/to lose color/to go white
to be suffused with white/to be discolored/to blanch
